Ohsung Kwon
Mechanical Engineer with 6+ years of CAE/FEA simulation experience in Multibody Dynamics, NVH(Noise, Vibration, and Harshness), and e-powertrain systems. Skilled in structural analysis and failure diagnosis, with a strong track record of cross-functional collaboration and system-level optimization. Recently completed an M.S. in Mechanical Engineering at Drexel University, specializing in dynamic simulation and control.

Expertise

CAD/CAE Skills

  • CAD Design: NX, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, CATIA
  • MBD Simulation: Ansys Motion, MSC.ADAMS
  • FEA Simulation: NX Nastran, Abaqus

Programming Skills

  • System Development: C, HTML
  • Simulation Solver: C++, FORTRAN
  • Data Analysis: Python, MATLAB

Analytical & Validation

  • Problem-solving: PDCA cycle, Kaizen, V-UP
  • Project Management: FMEA, PPAP
  • Design Compliance & Safety-margin Verification

Global Communication

  • Korean (First Language), Japanese (Fluent (JLPT N1))
  • Technical presentations to senior stakeholders
  • Cross-functional alignment as R&D representative

Myoelectric Prosthetic Arm
